meta.description: Maximize profit from making model trains and planes given resource constraints.

sets.name: MODELS
sets.description: Types of models: train and plane

params.name: wood_required
params.description: Units of wood required per model

params.name: paint_required
params.description: Units of paint required per model

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each model to produce

objective.name: max_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from trains and planes

constraints.name: wood_constraint
constraints.description: Wood usage must not exceed available wood

constraints.name: paint_constraint
constraints.description: Paint usage must not exceed available paint
